text:
Yea these older OEMs are going to hit this. 
1. Are you running bitlocker? If the answer is no - WHO CARES ABOUT THIS
UPDATE!!!!
Use one of the tools on the www.blockapatch.com
 site
and go on with life 
2. If the answer is yes 
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/kb5028997-instructions-to-manually-resize-your-partition-to-install-the-winre-update-400faa27-9343-461c-ada9-24c8229763bf

There is a nasty set of instructions on this page.
%40c3878efa.com
